name: OECD Recommendation on Artificial Intelligence
provider: Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD)
use_case: High-level principles to promote trustworthy AI, innovation, and human rights protections.
data_summary: Encourages responsible stewardship of data, privacy protections, and transparency for AI systems.
compliance_materials: Internal AI governance policies aligned with OECD principles
monitoring: Recommends continuous monitoring of AI impacts and mechanisms for accountability.
emergency_plan: Calls for mechanisms to address and remedy harmful outcomes from AI deployments.
obligations: Promote human-centered values and fairness in AI deployment.
Ensure transparency and responsible disclosure regarding AI systems.
Implement robust risk management and accountability measures.
